description: This file defines a service class 'PaymentsService' for handling payments in a mobile application. It interacts with an API client to process payments and manages errors related to network and server responses.

classes.name: PaymentsService
classes.description: Service for processing payments, utilizing an API client to send payment data and handle responses.

methods.name: PaymentsService
methods.description: Constructor initializing the PaymentsService with an API client.

methods.name: processPayment
methods.description: Processes a payment for a booking by sending payment details to the server and returning a Payment object.

methods.name: _handleError
methods.description: Handles errors encountered during the payment request, returning an appropriate error message.
